system.description: Through their unwavering faith, the character can invoke divine protection for themselves and their allies.
system.benefit: Can spend a Fate Point to grant you and a WP Bonus Allies immunity to Fear and Pinning, and -10 to be hit by ranged or melee attacks for the duration of the encounter. Can Burn a Fate point to allow an ally to resist a single attack and take no damage, must be burnt after hit but prior to damage roll.

specialAbilities.name: Divine Shield
specialAbilities.description: Spend a Fate Point: You and WP Bonus allies gain immunity to Fear/Pinning and -10 to be hit for the encounter.

specialAbilities.name: Miraculous Protection
specialAbilities.description: Burn a Fate Point: An ally resists a single attack and takes no damage (after hit, before damage).
